title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Another One Bites the Dust
description: Twitter discourse was dominated by the shocking fall of Binance CEO CZ on Tuesday.

title: Crypto Weekly Roundup: CZ Steps Down, SEC Goes After Kraken, And More
description: US crypto regulators have had a field day nay week with the notorious Binance-head Changpeng Zhao finally locked in the DOJ’s crosshairs and the SEC pursuing legal action against Kraken.

title: Ledger Warns XRP Holders of Increasing Scam Attempts Using Fake Airdrops
description: Ledger has issued a security alert to XRP holders about increasing scam attempts involving fake airdrops and fraudulent activities using Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse’s image. The company advises users never to transfer funds to unfamiliar addresses, to be skeptical of too-good-to-be-true offers, and never to disclose their 24-word recovery phrase. Rising Scam Attempts Targeting XRP [...]

title: Bitcoin’s Potential Rise to $40K by Year-End:  Experts Advise Investing in BorroeFinance for Significant Returns
description: Bitcoin (BTC) controls about 52% of the crypto market, and the recent positive mood among crypto investors led to a price pump in Q4 2023. Analysts are checking to see if the upcoming Bitcoin halving is enough to push the token to $40,000 before the end of the year. On the other hand, savvy investors [...]

title: Ripple (XRP) Whales Are At It Again: Time for a Yearly High?
description:
Whales have purchased around 11 million worth of Ripple (XRP) in the last seven days, Crypto analyst Ali Martinez disclosed. Martinez, who shared the data from on-chain analytic platform Santiment, noted that the value of these tokens was around $6.82 million. Typically, when these whales accumulate in large numbers, it signals a shift in market […]

The post Ripple (XRP) Whales Are At It Again: Time for a Yearly High? appeared first on Coin Edition.
